local_intent: Execute the grasp phase by detecting the pot, computing a side grasp pose, aligning, performing the grasp at the computed pose, and verifying stability.
assumptions: Pot is within reachable workspace and unobstructed.
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT sequence around GraspAtPose with same pose_key and strategy; adds minimal detect/align and post-grasp stability check consistent with GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION grasp robustness.
